title: E3 Paranormal Bitchslaps and the Body Examiners
description: Get your drinks ready. In episode 3 Em talks about a poltergeist legend from Southern folklore, the Bell Witch Haunting. Christine discusses the infamous unsolved case of the Black Dahlia murder.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
